editor.label: Application Server - IIS CreateVirtualDirectory2
editor.description: This procedure uses the ADSI API to create a new virtual directory in the specified web site.

formElement.label: Application directory:
formElement.documentation: Specify the path within the web site to the application directory (not the physical path).

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself, use 'localhost'. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute physical path of the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the virtual directory you want to create. i.e: 'c:/Inetpub/wwwroot/myvirtualdir2'. (Required)

formElement.label: Virtual directory name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name for the virtual directory. (Required)

formElement.label: Internal web site identifier:
formElement.documentation: Provide the numeric internal identifier of the web site. The default value is 1. (Required)
